entry.title: My twitter/X posts
entry.content:

are we on the early days of the singularity?

— Carlos José Barroso (@cjbarroso) December 21, 2024

entry.title: AI: Beyond Science Fiction - A Look at Its Gradual Takeover

link.title: AI: Beyond Science Fiction - A Look at Its Gradual Takeover

entry.summary: From finance to healthcare, AI is revolutionizing every aspect of our lives. Learn how AI can benefit you and unlock its potential to transform your world.

link.title: Don’t Lose Clients in Onboarding Hell: A Fintech Case Study in AI-powered Efficiency

entry.summary: Learn how a leading Fintech company used AI and cloud technology to streamline onboarding, reduce errors, and gain a competitive edge.

entry.title: Simplify CodeCommit Authentication
entry.summary: Discover the power of AWS Session Manager for simplified remote work. Enhance security, manage access, and track actions for improved efficiency and peace of mind.

entry.title: Cybersecurity Awareness: Phishing Prevention
entry.summary: Elevate your cybersecurity awareness with practical tips to prevent falling victim to phishing scams. Take charge of your online safety during Cybersecurity Month and equip yourself with the knowledge needed to recognize and thwart phishing attempts effectively.

entry.title: The Art of Data Management: AWS Data Pipelines

link.title: The Art of Data Management: AWS Data Pipelines

entry.summary: Discover the art of managing data effectively on AWS through robust data pipeline architectures. Gain insights into capture, ingestion, transformation, storage, and value extraction stages, empowering you to harness the full potential of your data assets.

entry.title: Terraform Workspaces with direnv & dotenv: Maintain Sanity in Multi-Environment Setups

entry.summary: Simplify complex Terraform workspace management! This guide explores how to leverage direnv and dotenv to keep your sanity intact when working with multiple environments.

entry.summary: Demystify Direnv and take your DevOps skills to the next level. Unlock the secrets of advanced Direnv usage, including dynamic environment management and tailored deployments.
